title: Print, Project for a ceiling. With alternative suggestions., ca. 1660
title_raw: Project for a ceiling. With alternative suggestions.
markings: Watermark on c: bunch of grapes
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of Mrs. John Innes Kane
description: Berlin 4007. Second state. The central part is -b. The drunken Silenus is brought to Bacchus who is seated on a rock. Ariadne on Naxos and a landscape are shown in the frame. Bottom: P. MARIETTE Auec Priuil. le Potre Fecit; an octagonal painting showing Bacchus being served wine is suggested in the frame of -a, instead of a polygonal landscape in -c.

tombstone.epitaph:
Print, Project for a ceiling. With alternative suggestions., ca. 1660. Etching. 
Museum purchase through gift of Mrs. John Innes Kane. 1944-24-5-a/c
